message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a unique opportunity that I believe will greatly benefit you. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am proposing a price of $9500 for it.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking for a more reasonable price. Would you consider selling it for $8500?
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value of the product and the benefits it provides, I propose a price of $9000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate the reduction, but I still believe we can come to an agreement closer to my initial proposal. Would you consider selling the product for $8750?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to lower the price to $8800 for the product. This is the best offer I can make considering its value and the market conditions.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to compromise further. Could you consider selling the product for $8700?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. After reviewing the situation, I am prepared to offer the product at $8650. This is the lowest price I can offer while still ensuring a reasonable profit for myself.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I am very close to agreeing on a price. Could you consider selling the product for $8600?

I see your point, Bob. Considering the value and the ongoing negotiations, I am willing to sell the product at $8550. This is the lowest price I can offer while still maintaining a fair profit margin.
Thank you for your flexibility, Alice. I am almost there. Could you consider selling the product for $8500?
